response.original_title: 実録!! ほんとにあった恐怖の怨念 お蔵入り映像 特別収録版
response.overview: A true record!!! In the series of submitted videos of real-life horrors, each time without fail, they were too horrific and too frightening to explain. In the series of submitted images of real horror, we have always encountered images that were too gruesome or too frightening to explain. This time, however, we have succeeded in recording some of the footage that has been kept in storage.
response.title: Real Record!! Truly Terrifying Resentment: Unreleased Footage Special Edition
